Others: The second unit of Denver Nuggets is being built with Russell Westbrook, Julian Strawther, Peyton Watson, Dario Saric, and a starter staggering with the bench or a 10th player in the rotation.
Jamal Murray's knee flared up during pregame warmups before the game against Phoenix Suns, limiting his playing time.
Coach Michael Malone is considering Christian Braun to complete the starting five and Julian Strawther to be a key piece to the second unit.
